articles.title: 'Greatest world has ever seen' - Williams tributes
articles.description: Tributes are paid to Serena Williams, who has played her final match as a tennis professional after a US Open third-round defeat.
articles.content:

articles.title: US approves $1.1bn Taiwan arms sale, angering China
articles.description: China urged the US to revoke the deal to provide missiles and a radar system or face "counter-measures".
